properties.headline: Lakeshore Flood Advisory issued January 23 at 9:04PM EST until January 25 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Detroit/Pontiac MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Minor lakeshore flooding expected.

* WHERE...Huron, Sanilac and St. Clair Counties.

* WHEN...From 4 PM Friday to 4 AM EST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Onshore or alongshore wind and high waves will
intensify flooding of prone areas along the lakeshore.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...East to southeast wind will strengthen
Friday evening. This brings high waves closer to the Lake Huron
shoreline leading to intensified lakeshore flooding Friday
evening through early Saturday morning.
properties.instruction:
Residents on or near the shore should take appropriate action to
protect property from rising water levels.

NWSheadline: LAKESHORE FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM FRIDAY TO 4 AM EST SATURDAY
